name: EVM Model
discription: Empower rural Indian villagers to effectively use Electronic Voting Machines (EVMs) in elections through an intuitive education model, promoting inclusive participation and confident voting.
technologies_Used: React Js, Bootstrap, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

name: News Applications
discription: I have developed a news application using React and the News API. The API is free to use on localhost, but in production, we need to purchase access to the API. While I was able to successfully create and test the application on my local machine, I encountered an error when I hosted the website. To handle this, I have implemented an error page that is displayed whenever an error occurs on the hosted site.
technologies_Used: React Js, Bootstrap, JavaScript, HTML, CSS
